title: Taking a chance on love
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Parent and child
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Identity (Psychology) in children
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/China - Social life and customs

description: Many years ago, Susan Dirgham's parents took a chance on love, in spite of their differences. Her parent's leap of faith has inspired Susan Dirgham to throw herself into new experiences and follow her heart, which has taken her to some very unusual places. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002062; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2010); Active; 2010
